meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6712.

td.p: Becky Giardina, a 7th grade social studies teacher from Martinez, Georgia
Anne Baxter, a kindergarten French teacher from Ypsilanti, Michigan
Patrick Dillon, an elementary music teacher from Huntington, New York

tr.td: FLAVOR OF THE MONTH
SCIENCE SURVEY
FLASHIN' SOME FASHION
SOUNDS LIKE FOOTBALL
MOVIES WITH STRUCTURE
INDEPENDENCE NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK

Madison & Jefferson were opposed, but Hamilton\'s vision of a strong central government, in economics as well as politics, won out & this financial institution was created in 1791, headquartered here in Philadelphia')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

Madison & Jefferson were opposed, but Hamilton's vision of a strong central government, in economics as well as politics, won out & this financial institution was created in 1791, headquartered here in Philadelphia

Anne
Becky

tr.td: Patrick
Anne
Becky
STAND BY YOUR STAN
TEXTING IN CLASS
CELEBRITY RELATIVES
LET'S ALL CHANT
MAKING A BEE LINE
FRONT TO BACK, BACK TO FRONT
(Alex: Each correct response will be two words that are the reverse of each other, for example "golf" and "flog".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
